website_summaries.verdict: Has many of the same features as the more expensive models, but for a lower price.
pros: Swivels a full 360 degrees and has a removable headrest and lumbar support pillow so you can adjust however you want
Tilts up to 160 degrees and locks as well
cons: Difficult to assemble and can get wobbly over time

customer_reviews.title: Save your money for something better made
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. I am an average sized adult. 5' 10" 185 lbs. The chair looks good and was fine for a few months but now the hydraulic that controls the seat height is failing, It is starting to lower on its own incrementally as I sit in it. It is also very wobbly. Unfortunately my window has closed and I am stuck with this thing. No response from customer support. You have been warned. I now am the owner of A DX Racer and I should have pulled the trigger on it from the start.
customer_reviews.author: dreadfulwater

customer_reviews.title: Cannot ride unless shorter than 60 inches...
customer_reviews.text: This chair is not designed for a full grown man. The wings on the seat have bars that cut into my legs, there is a bar in the mid back that hits my spine in a really bad place, and the head rest pillow is six inches to low . This chair is really uncomfortable to sit in for more then 30 mins without adding pillows to the seat and back. I do not recommend this product to anyone taller then 60 inches(5 feet) or over 140 pounds...
customer_reviews.author: Pc Gamer

customer_reviews.title: Bad Seat Adjustment, You Will Fall Out Of The Chair
customer_reviews.text: It's a decent chair but I have a massive complaint about the seat cushion area. It wants to lean very far forward, to the point where you have to hold yourself in the chair. I have tried adjusting the tension via the giant black knob underneath. That barely fixes the issue and the knob seems to slip or something because the tension will reset back to where I started within a couple of minutes. Do yourself a favor and get a chair from elsewhere, this one looks cool but it's mostly junk.
customer_reviews.author: Garret

customer_reviews.title: Great chair. Great customer service from seller
customer_reviews.text: Great chair. Great customer service from seller. Comfortable and looks nice. Had a broken piece upon arrival... just the cups that go over the pump. Seller responded quickly and gave a small refund. It doesn't effect the chair any and you don't even notice it unless you're looking for it. No issues with the pump, no issues with screw holes. Everything fit nicely and tight together.
customer_reviews.author: A Memory Faded

customer_reviews.title: Okay chair--modified review
customer_reviews.text: Now that I've had this chair a year or so later I can say that this chair isn't so great. It looks cool, but after awhile the hydraulics have gotten the wonkiest I've ever seen with a chair. I've lost weight and yet the chair will sink every now and again. And the lumbar and neck supports aren't adjustable, so they're mostly useless if you're not a certain height. I'm here because I'm going to buy another chair.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel F. Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for long periods of time at a computer
customer_reviews.text: I decided to purchase this after son#1 bought himself a Merax chair and he is very pleased with his ... so I bought for son#2 who is an avid computer gamer. He loves it. Period. Very comfortable to sit in for long periods of time, easy enough to assemble. He can recline if he needs a break. He is very happy!
customer_reviews.author: LindaB

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: This chair did not last and was a waste of money! Everything kept getting loose and the chair felt like it always tilted forward. We finally took it out and stuck it by the road. Will never buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: the blue is not the same blue in the picture.
customer_reviews.text: its 4 starts for what it is. which is a cheap racer style chair advertised for gamers that see those maxnomics/akracing/ or dxracer chairs on the internet. its not really uncomfortable but their are notable differences in comfort between this chair and some of the more expensive ones. But i never expected anything amazing out of this chair when i ordered it, so all of that is fine. I give it one less star because the blue is lighter toned in person than it is in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: meh
customer_reviews.text: Uhh so, I haven't had this chair for a very long time, and one of the wheels have actually fallen off. It has not just detached, it's literally a part that the wheel sticks to, so yes I can remelt it together, but I don't believe I should have to after a few weeks and for the chair costing 100$. I would in fact not purchase this item again.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew T Brown

customer_reviews.title: It’s not super comfortable, but it’s not super uncomfortable and it’s ...
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t realize the arms weren’t adjustable and that’s on me, but in the year 2017 you’d expect the arms to be adjustable. It’s not super comfortable, but it’s not super uncomfortable and it’s a big step up from me old chair. All and all not bad...I love the color! 3 out of 5.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Chair broke within 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Back of chair broke off within 3 months of owning. Contacted seller who said would help and asked for order details and photos. Once provided they never contacted back. My 16 year old wasted over $125 of his hard earned/saved money for a chair that barely lasted 3 months. Poor quality and customer service. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Fetters

customer_reviews.title: There are better chairs out there.
customer_reviews.text: Pilot holes didn't match with the leather. Installation was a nightmare. There are 2 metal bars that prevent you from crossing your legs or even spreading your legs slightly. It lifts off the ground before it will roll forward. Very difficult to roll around on hardwood floors. The lift system is very finicky. You have to push back to a "sweet spot" in order for the chair to move up or down.
customer_reviews.author: zoey

customer_reviews.title: Son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as Christmas gift and my son loves it. Very sturdy and comfortable. He works on the computer all day and this was much better than the chair he’d bought
customer_reviews.author: yay me

customer_reviews.title: Great Price.
customer_reviews.text: I was going to cancel it because I weight 215lbs which is close to the 225 lbs max. that the chair supports. But I am glad I didnt. The chair holds me even when I lean back while reclined. Great chair and it looks amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Vargas

customer_reviews.title: Falls apart within a year
customer_reviews.text: Had this chair for less than a year and it started to fall apart. It leans to right and very wobbly even though all the bolts are tight. Going in the trash
customer_reviews.author: Joker

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: 6 Months in and the chair is basically useless. No cushion on the seat at all. Chair is slanted at this point and im only 190 pounds. Arm rests never stay tight, not even for a day. Very cheap chair, I would spend the extra instead of getting ripped off. Disappointed it only lasted this long, maybe they'll do something to make up in the customer service department.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and adjustable
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this chair. It is very sturdy, comfortable, and adjustable. Great leg and lumbar support, easy to clean. It was easy to assemble and I am sure he will enjoy it as a gaming chair for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Holt

customer_reviews.title: not the best quality
customer_reviews.text: looked really cute but was a little challenging to put together. Didn't last but to be fair my son is hard on stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: This chair is a piece of crap you spend more time trying to get the screws to stay tight they keep loosening
customer_reviews.author: israel gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice but cheaply made.
customer_reviews.text: Had for about 2 months then the bottom mount ripped itself out while leaning back. Looks cool but its very poor build quality even for the cheap price. Also not that comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Hartmann

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and perfect
customer_reviews.text: Was a great gift for my Secret Santa; they weren't expecting it at all despite having put it on their wishlist. It was a fun surprise!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Good Gaming Chair
customer_reviews.text: My son in law has this. He seems to really like it. Great for gaming.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality. Not very adjustable.
customer_reviews.text: i have had the chair a little over a year. it is not very adjustable and does not feel stable when reclined. also the armrest is peeling apart.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Holub

customer_reviews.title: Amazing gaming chair
customer_reviews.text: Amazing gaming chair! So comfortable and for the price you can't beat it! Absolutely happy with this chair for my girlfriend!
customer_reviews.author: Chad Lowell

customer_reviews.title: Piston broken armrest fallen off
customer_reviews.text: the chair no longer goes up and down the armrest broke the metal inside the chair is rusty the chair is mostly devoid of any kind of cushioning
customer_reviews.author: David & Stephanie Brownfield

customer_reviews.title: Great Chair
customer_reviews.text: Great comfortable chair so far. Bought it for my son and he loves it. Very easy to assemble. I am actually buying another one for my office.
customer_reviews.author: treesmp5

customer_reviews.title: Great chair!
customer_reviews.text: Stylish chair and great for a computer desk for a pre-teen kid! Love the color and pillows it comes with. It was very easy to put together also.
customer_reviews.author: Proud Mom

customer_reviews.title: The chair is great and for the most part very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The chair is great and for the most part very comfortable. The only minor set back is the sitting area has firm bars the holds its form on the side. If I was a little smaller framed would be perfect, but still a great chair. I would recommend it, in fact I'm buying another one for my son.
customer_reviews.author: Todd lewis

customer_reviews.title: Works best for long sessions
customer_reviews.text: I liked this product, I've had it for over 2 months, and has worked perfectly, the only thing I would want to be different is that over time, the arm rests tend to loosen on their own and I have to screw them back in, other than that, it works perfectly as intended!
customer_reviews.author: Braiden Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 8 months of use
customer_reviews.text: The screws that came with this chair must be cheaply produced because only 8 months after buying one of the screws snapped in half. Now the left armrest moves all over the place. Tried to fix it but half of the screw is still inside, fully tightened with no head to remove. Trying to get a refund but doesn't look like thats happening
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for price, but milage may vary...
customer_reviews.text: Chair is comfortable with extended sitting. I am 5'11" and 230lbs. The only gripe that I have with this chair is the hydrolic has developed a rocking and constant lean, along with losing height on its own without touching the lever to adjust the chair position.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!!
customer_reviews.text: My sons both have these chairs. They love them!! They use them for gaming. The first chair we got was damaged and the company came through big time on making the situation right!! I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT for gaming chair
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT for gaming chair. Only complaint that i have is I wish it would lower as my desk is little lower that the chair. ( I think I should just buy a new desk ) But beside that its a GREAT GAMING chair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made, very uncomfortable. arm rest do not stay tight at all. even after i tighten them they are loose 20 minutes later. Spend a little more and buy something durable. its ok for kids, but has no leg room and starts to hurt your thighs
customer_reviews.author: Natasha C

customer_reviews.title: Abdolutely love the chair itself
customer_reviews.text: Abdolutely love the chair itself, but the wheels are awful. They do not roll well at all. I have wood flooring and use a desk chair mat but have the hardest time getting my chair to roll. The chait is super comfy and the lumbar support is amazing, but they really need to rethink the wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good chair for taller people
customer_reviews.text: Good chair for taller people. I'm almost 6 foot and my legs reach the floor at comfortable level. Seat cushion is a bit short with the lumbar support on. but feels sturdy and rolls nice. Would love for the arm rest to adjust up 2 inches and in 2 inches because of my narrow frame but overall good chair
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee (Wife)

customer_reviews.title: Got as a gaming chair for my teen age son ...
customer_reviews.text: Got as a gaming chair for my teen age son he gives it a 5 star I give it a 5 star because we set it up together and it was easy
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes noise
customer_reviews.text: After a short time it start making noise whenever you move. For the price is a good chair.
customer_reviews.author: Yves R.

customer_reviews.title: Electric Blue
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a birthday gift and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent Flyer

customer_reviews.title: This is totally worst made chair
customer_reviews.text: Its not holding at all should’ve bought something from local store
customer_reviews.author: Rustem

customer_reviews.title: incredibly comfortable chair for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality, incredibly comfortable chair for the price. I get many compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: MW

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but makes noise
customer_reviews.text: Has been a great chair. 3 stars because I purchased the chair to replace my squeaky one and this one creeks/pops when I move. I only weigh 160. But for the price, not a bad chair.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Padgett

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Assemble
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my grandson that is a gamer. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Garbage. Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Chair almost immediately became loose and had to be retightened multiple times, without over using the chair's welds snapped in half causing me to fall backwards. Do not waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Keagan

customer_reviews.title: Great gaming chair
customer_reviews.text: The chair shaft for the shock came bent and I didn’t realize it till I had it all together. The seller is resolving the problem for me. Other than that it’s a good quality seat.
customer_reviews.author: Justin C

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable chair
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable! It did take more time than expected to put together.
customer_reviews.author: MSblueMagnolia

customer_reviews.title: Durable!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a Christmas gift for our son and he was really surprised. He hasn’t complained it one bit. He’s a happy camper!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Frison

customer_reviews.title: easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Shipped well, delivered quickly, easy to assemble. Feels sturdy. Careful with the full recline it goes down quickly.
customer_reviews.author: nathan allen mitchell

customer_reviews.title: A good chair.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice and comfortable chair, but after a few weeks of use, it’s lost some of it’s cushioning.
customer_reviews.author: Bryce Mallow

customer_reviews.title: Decently comfortable
customer_reviews.text: It's fairly comfortable, the reclining is pretty nice, armrests are pretty meh. The big problem is like others have said: the hydraulics are failing, and the chair sinks immediately after sitting in it. I'm 5'10/1.778 meters tall and 160 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: John B.

customer_reviews.title: must buy
customer_reviews.text: just got it a piece was broken but other then that it was awesome its cheap its a must buy
customer_reviews.author: Smoked Lobbies

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expected
customer_reviews.text: It was simple to put together and my son likes it
customer_reviews.author: Kjf15

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: You truly get what you pay for here. I should have bought something with better quality. The hydrolic rod will not stay at the height I set it at, consistently goes down (wont stay up). Chair is less than a year old.
customer_reviews.author: alphafilter

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy poorly made
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy stay away only had this chair under six months and it’s broke Poorly made !!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice styling chair
customer_reviews.text: Love the chair. I'm still using it and it's been almost 6 months! Thanks! Good quality. I'm 170 pounds and chair ain't wobbling. It's a good starting chair. If you have an extra budget, buy a great quality chair.
customer_reviews.author: Ranier Navasca

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I use it for gaming. Great chair would be awesome if it had leg rest.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed buyer!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this chair for my son for Christmas. When it was opened and we attempted to put it together, The zipper was broken and the material around it was ripped. It was very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Great chair
customer_reviews.text: Great chair love the reclining feature if you have a relative thats into gaming ai definitely recommend this as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: sOaP E Toes

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Birthday gift for my 14 year old! He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: macon ritter

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my son's desk since he didn't have a ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son's desk since he didn't have a chair. He likes and his little brother loves it, and know he wants one
customer_reviews.author: Mike G.

customer_reviews.title: Decent chair
customer_reviews.text: Chair was easy to put together, and is fairly comfortable. But the screws on the are strip easily and have issues staying tight
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Got it in a very good price and the product came with perfect
customer_reviews.text: Got it in a very good price and the product came with perfect, just the box a little bit up
customer_reviews.author: martins

customer_reviews.title: The chair was great until I rolled forward and the wheel broke
customer_reviews.text: The chair was great until I rolled forward and the wheel broke. i dont know how this happened but the wheels are completely made out of plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Dante

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase so far
customer_reviews.text: I bought this chair for my son who is interested in PC gaming. He really likes the chair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: excellent!
customer_reviews.text: exactly as pictured! easy to assemble! delivered in good condition!
customer_reviews.author: KRW

customer_reviews.title: Too Expensive for the the Quality you get
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable chair and the adjustable parts are nice, however this chair broke for me in less than a month and the pieces are very cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Baharian

customer_reviews.title: It was a beautiful gift
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my son, which he really loves
customer_reviews.author: David Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it to play Xbox in....Comfort, head and back support
customer_reviews.author: Jill Miller

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gaming chair
customer_reviews.text: The chair is perfect and easy to put together! Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the most comfortable after extended sessions
customer_reviews.text: Seems of decent construction. Not the most comfortable after extended sessions. It’s alright for the money.
customer_reviews.author: tyler

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: perfect chair for the price i just wish it was a little wider
customer_reviews.author: fred

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: I got it for my son He really likes it Very comfortable Well made
customer_reviews.author: connie raymond

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love the chair easy to set up and looks great feels great very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Jon

product_meta.title: Merax PP036128KAA High Back Gaming Chair with Lumbar Support and Headrest
product_meta.description:
Color:WhiteMerax has been always devoting itself to delivering the best products of high quality and cost-effectiveness to our customers. Our only pursuit is to meet our customers’ all kinds of demands no matter how hard it is to fulfill.

Our Merax chair designers spent days and nights drafting and discussing what kind of design is going to be suitable for our customers and satisfy their demands. Finally, they came into being and turn out to be popular and welcome for theirs features. 

Except for focusing on their great-looking design, our structural engineers always spared no effort in designing easy set-up structure frame during assembly. And also instruction is committed to be straightforward enough for everyone to understand.
feature_bullets: Constructed with metal frame and outfitted with thickly padded cushion
Lean back with ease at any angle down to 160 degree you desire with our expertly designed recline locking system for your security and peace of mind
Removable headrest and lumbar support pillows make long period of working or gaming more comfortable according to personal favor
360 degree swivel and multi-direction wheels which move smoothly on floor or carpet
Big sturdy base provides you with superb stability; weight limit 225lbs

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars141 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
